pullrequest.title: Add light as child of link

content.raw:
this is mainly so that I can reuse the function in Link class to load lights. 

Ideally Link class should have its own `LoadLight` function and store a list of lights there. `FillMsg` should also populate the link msg with lights but that requires updating the proto file and breaks ABI. For simplicity, I reused the World class LoadLight function to create Light and add it to `sceneMsg`so the rendering side gets this info.
